data.question: Upon doing otoscopy, a perforation in the lower left quadrant of the right eardrum is observed. In the referral to the doctor, which of the following is the BEST way to describe the findings?

A 67-year old patient/client has been referred by his physician for hearing instruments.  He reports recent significant changes in hearing and is upset about not hearing his family as well as he thinks he should.  What case history information would be MOST pertinent to this patient's concerns?
Which of the following would be the MOST likely cause of this audiometric configuration?

answers.answer: the use of the NU-6 list

data.question: Properly administered speech discrimination testing requires:

answers.answer: the patient will speak loudly when unaided

data.question: A patient with a PTA of 60 dB, binaurally accompanied by a conductive component of 35 dB would be LEAST likely to exhibit which of the following?

answers.answer: increasing the pressure at the stapes footplate
decreasing the pressure at the oval window
equalizing the pressure at the stapes footplate
increase the pressure on the long process of the malleous

data.question: The primary function of the middle ear is to match the impedance of the outer ear to the inner ear by:

answers.answer: estimating unaided and aided word recognition based on pure tone audiometry
measuring functional gain for a hearing instrument set at MCL

data.question: The articulation index scale can be used for:
Which of the following frequencies would be MOST affected by a head cold?
The patient/client has a prolapsed canal.  How BEST should the hearing health professional proceed with the hearing evaluation?
Which of the following tests would best predict the signal-to-noise ratio necessary for a hearing impaired person to understand speech normally in noise?
Smaller ID (inside diameter) tubing will:

answers.answer: the size 10 battery will last longer
the size 13 battery will last longer
both batteries should last the same length of time
unable to determine which will last longer

data.question: One hearing instrument uses a size 10 battery and has a 0.25 mA current drain.  Another hearing instrument uses a size 13 battery and has a 1.8 mA current drain.  Which of the following statements is TRUE?
A disadvantage of WDRC and DSP processing is patient complaints of hearing noises where there are no sounds. Which of the following is used to correct this problem?
The articulation index puts the greatest value to speech intelligibility at which frequency?
What would be the BEST way to prevent an intermittency in the hearing instrument from showing up in the delivery process?
Which condition of the human ear has NO effect on real ear-probe tube measurements?

answers.answer: REIG has more gain above 3000 Hz
REIG is less due to insertion loss
REIG will have less high frequency response with C.I.C.'s
REIG has less gain at 500 Hz

data.question: The typical difference between real ear insertion gain and 2 cc coupler response is:
The function of an acoustic coupler is:
Which of the following procedures would MOST likely be associated with fitting problems?
When considering different digital hearing instruments, open platform technology is generally considered:
When troubleshooting a hearing instrument, you discover the electrical signal cannot be converted into acoustical energy. Which component is MOST likely defective?

answers.answer: An electrical noise and hissing can be heard when examining the hearing instrument.  What is MOST likely wrong with this hearing instrument?

data.question: In troubleshooting a high-end digital ITC hearing instrument, it is discovered that there is no gain
A C.I.C hearing instrument that has a lot of circuit noise but very little amplification would MOST likely have which of the following?
In counseling a patient about the use and care of a hearing instrument, the patient should be told that the MOST common cause of hearing instrument failure is:

answers.answer: Increased capacity for aid to change with hearing changes
Exact fit to the patient's hearing loss

data.question: When discussing benefits of multi-channel digital hearing instruments which of the following does NOT apply?
